name: Omoide ni Kawaru Kimi: Memories Off
overview: Omoide ni Kanata Kimi: Memories Off (想い出にかわる君 ~メモリーズオフ~, lit. You That Became a Memory ~Memories Off~) is a Japanese romance visual novel developed by KID for the Dreamcast and the PlayStation. It is the third game in the Memories Off series. The game was released for the Dreamcast and the PlayStation on September 27, 2001. It was later ported to the PlayStation 2 and PlayStation Portable. It was adapted into the first tale of an OVA series, titled as "Memories Off 3.5: Omoide no Kanata e". Shougo is a lazy university student. He used to have a girlfriend called Kanata Kurosu, but one day she left him and he didn't know anything about her. One day, he meets her at the Cubic Cafe, Shougo's usual relax spot, and a new story beings...
